Getting Started

We are glad you are here and we are looking forward to getting you started with Cre8or! We will be soon diving with you into the creative concepts, packaging, favorite ingredients and formulations of your existing or future brand.

In doing so, we will need to ask you a few questions to discover your passion product. While not all questions are mandatory, the more you answer, the closer you point us towards what you really want.

Are you an: *





What category would you like your product line to be in?




Are you open to exploring new categories other than your top interests?

Is this your first time launching a beauty brand?

Are there any branding guidelines, logos, or colors your team has developed?

Are you currently in any exclusive or long-term partnerships?
